posts.post_content: Thought I'd try this given current prices.  T206 Green Cobb PSA 4 for sale $4200, regular paypal ok, add $75 for shipping and insurance, will be sent with received signature required.    If scans are too small let me know and I can send via email (I can't seem to ever get these to be full size, if anyone can help I'd appreciate that).  Thanks for looking please email me at [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url] if interested. Note there is a small chip in the lower right corner.

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=1471389]Thought I'd try this given current prices.  T206 Green Cobb PSA 4 for sale $4200, regular paypal ok, add $75 for shipping and insurance, will be sent with received signature required.    If scans are too small let me know and I can send via email (I can't seem to ever get these to be full size, if anyone can help I'd appreciate that).  Thanks for looking please email me at [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.[/QUOTE]

Great card. Send me large scans to [url]leon@net54baseball.com[/url] and I will help. Our system downsizes the scans automatically. If they are hosted somewhere else and you use the little yellow looking mountain box to post the url (right above here) you can make them as large as you want to. I host my scans on my own website for use here when I want them to be large...LL
The best I could do, Bob, with your minis.

[quote name="Leon" post=1472565]Great card. Send me large scans to [url]leon@net54baseball.com[/url] and I will help. Our system downsizes the scans automatically. If they are hosted somewhere else and you use the little yellow looking mountain box to post the url (right above here) you can make them as large as you want to. I host my scans on my own website for use here when I want them to be large...LL[/QUOTE]

Thanks Leon.

I have a good feeling the card is better focused than the images because the holder also has some "wear" isssues that look scan related (fuzziness). I am making no guarantees :)...good luck everyone and I might suggest a flatbed scanner scan for this card if possible. 

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/cobb3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/cobb3b.jpg[/IMG]

I see the Green PSA 4 in Goldin's auction went for about $5700.00

Joe
